data.name: Misty Knight
data.description: Misty Knight is the tough-as-nails leader of the Heroes for Hire who uses her cybernetic arm to break through her enemies' defenses.

starItems.name: Misty Knight
starItems.description: Misty Knight is the tough-as-nails leader of the Heroes for Hire who uses her cybernetic arm to break through her enemies' defenses.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If Colleen Wing is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a random Colleen Wing ally.

If Colleen Wing is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the enemy with the highest damage instead of the primary target and will instead Chain to an enemy with the most Speed Bar, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on all enemy summons + attack them for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.  This part of the attack cannot be dodged.
> Gain <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Colleen Wing is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain up to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the enemy with the highest damage instead of the primary target and will instead Chain to an enemy with the most Speed Bar, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on all enemy summons + attack them for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.  This part of the attack cannot be dodged.
> Gain <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Colleen Wing is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to summoned enemies

1.description:
Clear all positive effects on the primary target and then attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the enemy with the highest health instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Gain <color=#86e619>+5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Colleen Wing is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, If this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Grant <color=#86e619>10</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
1.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies

2.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Grant <color=#86e619>10</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

3.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Grant <color=#86e619>10</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

4.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Grant <color=#86e619>10</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
4.nextUpgrade:
On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies or self
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus

5.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> at <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies or self that do not have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>70%</color> Focus.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, On Spawn:
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Grant <color=#86e619>10</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
